description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Seminyak, Indonesia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Seminyak Adults-Only Private Pool Villas with Massages, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
hotels.description: Tucked away in central Seminyak yet worlds apart from the bustle, One Eleven Resorts boasts nine luxurious villas tailored for adults seeking true relaxation. Each villa features a private pool, a tranquil spa gazebo and dedicated butler service - an embodiment of the sweet life. Beyond your private pocket of paradise, don't miss Shiro Sushi and Sake Bar, a culinary delight that sets the bar high with its expertly crafted sashimi and mouthwatering sake. +Spa is where the real magic happens, offering traditional Balinese treatments that will leave you feeling like you're floating on air. When you're ready to dive back into the action, Laksamana Street's buzz is right on your doorstep. Perfectly positioned, the resort is also a short stroll from Seminyak Beach's golden sands, and a quick drive to cultural gems like Tanah Lot temple and Canggu's renowned surf spots. You're close enough to the fun but far enough to truly find your zen.

hotels.title: One of the World's 50 Best Hotels: Seminyak Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner & Cocktails
hotels.description: Basked in sunshine and set directly on Seminyak’s golden sands - separate from but connected to the world-famous beach club of the same name - this beachside resort continues to earn its accolades for good reason. It’s no surprise it’s been named by The World's 50 Best Hotels Academy as one of The World’s 50 Best Hotels two years running, in 2024 and 2025. With daily dining included in your package, you’re all set to taste some of Bali’s best. Think wood-fired pizzas at Pizza Garden, relaxed comfort food at the open-air Beachfront Restaurant and creative vegetarian dishes at Tanaman Restaurant. As the sun sets, head to the rooftop bar at Sunset Park for cocktails with ocean views. When you're ready to explore, Seminyak’s iconic restaurants, bars and nightlife are just minutes away. Browse upscale boutiques and galleries, graze your way along Eat Street or wander some of Bali’s most picturesque beachfront. Return to the privacy of the suite and studio resort wing and spend your afternoons relaxing by the resort's guest-only infinity pool or under the shade of swaying palms.

hotels.title: Seminyak Luxury Villa Stay Minutes from Double Six Beach
hotels.description: A serene haven in the heart of Bali's famed beach district, Aksari Villa Seminyak delivers luxury villas perfect for romantic escapes or soothing stays. Ideally situated within close range of refined restaurants and chic boutiques, Aksari delivers easy access to Seminyak's hottest attractions. Plunge into your private pool, relish the peace of your private villa or treat yourself to a blissful spa treatment before heading to one of the many nearby beaches to savour a Seminyak sunset.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Five-Star Seminyak Stay
hotels.description: Discover paradise in the heart of Seminyak with a stay at the stylish Trans Resort Bali. Surrounded by designer boutiques, remarkable restaurants and beachside bars, this five-star resort is just minutes from all the action but remains a tranquil escape thanks to its extensive grounds and luxurious facilities. The oversized rooms and suites suggest space and serenity, with outdoor jacuzzis and daybeds as standard. Sixteen extravagant villas go that one step further, each with private pools, hot tubs and blissful Balinese gardens. Spend the day lounging on the resort’s very own manmade beach, where Australian sand gives way to the sparkling blue waters of the outdoor pool, or venture to the Trans Spa, where a slew of rejuvenating and revitalising treatments await. Find your Zen with a yoga class, or work up a sweat at the fitness centre, where personal trainers provide individual coaching, and recovery comes in the form of aromatic steam rooms, dry saunas and hot and cold plunge pools. For frazzled families, a comprehensive kids' club allows the little ones to explore their creativity - and parents to enjoy some much-needed time off! Whatever your type of escape, at The Trans Resort Bali you can expect world-class hospitality and a luxe break from everyday life.

hotels.title: Five-Star Seminyak Beach Glamour with Seven Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Step out directly onto the beach from Hotel Indigo Bali Seminyak Beach, a five-star resort in the buzzing hub of Seminyak, Bali's most vibrant, sought-after area. There are seven onsite eateries and bars to be wined and dined: order a cocktail at the Cave Pool Lounge, a poolside bar and restaurant, listen to music while feasting on Japanese izakaya favourites at at SugarSand, and sip freshly brewed coffee with a pastry at the Pottery café. In between mealtimes, work up a sweat at the 24/7 fitness centre and various daily resort activities, take a dip in the main swimming pool (or the secret garden pool), or indulge in a spa treatment at Sava Spa.

hotels.title: Lively Seminyak Escape with Sky-High Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Vibrant nightlife, world-class beaches, buzzing shopping strips and too-good-to-be-true eateries are just a few of the many reasons travellers love Seminyak, and an ultra-stylish stay at TS Suites Seminyak is the best way to experience it all. Step right out of the hotel onto a bustling street lined with boutiques and local restaurants or catch the complimentary shuttle to Double Six Beach just a short ride away. This lively resort is the place to go for a dose of rest and relaxation by day, before coming alive at night. Sit by the 50-metre sky-high infinity pool and snack away on light bites or grab a cocktail from the pool bar. Later, enjoy a front-row spot to watch the sky transform from soft pink tones to fiery red hues. The fun continues into the night, with the rooftop entertainment precinct open until 11pm. For a change of scenery, drop into the hotel’s very own nightclub, Jenja, or kick back in the TSea Leisure Club and dine on international cuisine.

hotels.vendor_name: Ayona Villa Seminyak by Ini Vie Hospitality
hotels.title: Romantic Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Private Rooftop Terraces & Floating Bathtubs
hotels.description: Find your slice of Seminyak bliss with an intimate and romantic escape at this oh-so-chic collection of villas, nestled in the island’s most happening neighbourhood. Perfect for couples or honeymooners exploring Bali, every detail of this property is designed to elevate the love - savour a floating breakfast in your private pool, laze the day away in your villa's hammock and enjoy ice-cold beers on your private terrace as the horizon melts away. When you’re ready to explore, Seminyak’s extraordinary collection of brilliant beach clubs, world-class restaurants and upscale boutiques await.

hotels.vendor_name: Seminyak Sanctuary Villa - (Previously Legian Kriyamaha Villa)
hotels.title: Bali Pool Villa Serenity near Legian & Seminyak
hotels.description: Seek rest and romance in your private pool villa oasis at Seminyak Sanctuary Villa. Centrally located on the border of Legian and Seminyak, yet tucked away in a world of its own, the property is in the perfect location for both relaxation and exploration. Organise a candlelit dinner and more with the hotel’s many thoughtful services or venture into the bustling streets of Bali, where eateries and beach clubs abound.

hotels.title: Seminyak Beachfront Bliss with Onsite Dining, Lagoon Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Spoil your senses with a sublime stay at Double-Six Luxury Hotel, a five-star Seminyak beach haven perched on Bali’s sought-after southwest coast. Soak up ocean views from one of Bali’s largest resort pools, a sprawling lagoon-style beauty that winds through the property and flows almost to the beach. Indulge in a curated dining scene, from dry aged, exclusively sourced and imported meat at The Plantation Grill Seminyak to shared plates and nibbles of Asian cusine delights at Suzie-Q Asian Twist Kitchen. 15 metres above sea level, take in panoramic ocean views at one of Bali's largest rooftop bars, Double-Six Rooftop Sunset Bar. With a refreshing locally-inspired cocktail or coconut in hand, this is beachfront luxury at its finest. When it’s time to unwind, slip into serenity at Acqua Perla Spa or simply watch the sun melt into the horizon from your sun lounger.

hotels.title: Boutique Seminyak Suite & Villa Hideaway with Onsite Restaurant & Tranquil Pool
hotels.description: Surrender to the tropical charms of Bali's chic Seminyak region with a sophisticated stay just steps from many of the island’s most popular restaurants, cafes and boutiques. Cocooned amid lush greenery, this tranquil abode is ideal for families and travellers seeking sunshine and serenity. Spend your days gliding through the resort's crystal-clear pools or take a leisurely stroll to the nearby Seminyak Beach, famed for its stunning sunsets and world-class surf. Dine on authentic flavours at the onsite Groove restaurant, discover Seminyak’s culinary gems and get a glimpse of the island's vibrant nightlife.

hotels.title: Five-Star Seminyak Retreat with Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Treat yourself to the escape you deserve at Montigo Resorts Seminyak, a stylish five-star urban oasis in the heart of one of Bali’s most loved areas. Find your slice of island paradise just steps from Seminyak's must-visit spots, including the legendary Potato Head and Mrs Sippy beach clubs, plus plenty of family-friendly restaurants and attractions. Spend the day lounging beside the pool or venture to Montigo Spa, where a slew of rejuvenating and revitalising treatments await. While there's no shortage of ways to spend your days at the resort, if you're looking to travel further afield you can enjoy one of the hotel's scooter tours. Onsite, little ones will love Tilo Kids Club - and parents can enjoy some much-needed time off! Whatever your type of escape, Montigo Resorts Seminyak offers something to please travellers of all styles.

hotels.title: Urban-Chic Colourful Seminyak Stay near Beach Clubs with Onsite Restaurant, Bars & Swimming Pool
hotels.description: In the pumping heart of Seminyak, Viva Dash Hotel offers guests a vibrant, urban-chic stay paired with pop-art wall murals at every turn. Visit Azul Rooftop bar for chilled cocktails and panoramic views or pop into the funky C'est La VIE Restaurant & Bar, the hotel's signature ground-floor eatery. Take advantage of the central outdoor pool for a refreshing dip or prioritise your wellbeing with a visit to the massage therapy and spa rooms for a tranquil pampering session.

hotels.title: Serene Seminyak Escape with Yoga Studio & Resort Pool
hotels.description: Rejuvenate mind, body and soul with an escape to Blue Karma Dijiwa Seminyak - a restorative retreat in the heart of Seminyak. Find yourself at the intersection of luxury and tranquillity as you take advantage of impeccably designed Balinese-style villas, sparkling outdoor pools and sumptuous whole foods. Boasting a quiet and calm locale that feels incredibly private, the resort is also close to Seminyak’s finest attractions, including vibrant Seminyak Square and iconic Double Six Beach.

hotels.title: Beachfront Glamour Alila Seminyak Retreat with Signature Dining, Beach Bar & Spa
hotels.description: Revel in laidback luxury on Seminyak’s iconic beachfront with a glamorous five-star stay, perfectly positioned within walking distance of the world-class dining and nightlife of Bali’s most beloved beachside district. Indulge in ancient restorative treatments at acclaimed wellness sanctuary Spa Alila, splash your way across the resort’s four magnificent pools or savour wild-caught seafood at beachside fusion eatery Seasalt, with each dish seasoned with East Bali’s organic Kusamba sea salt.

hotels.title: Adults-Only Five-Star Seminyak Pool Villas
hotels.description: Offering contemporary style and tropical seclusion in the heart of Seminyak, the adults-only One Eleven is the epitome of luxury villa living, with a five-star resort experience. Push back the weighted wooden door to your palatial oasis and find yourself in a secluded, palm-fringed landscape with blissfully manicured lawns and an extravagant private spa gazebo. The villa's most striking feature is its impressive 14-metre private swimming pool that beautifully reflects in the panoramic floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors that mark the entrance to your luxury abode. Step through and discover an effortlessly styled space with ample living areas, a contemporary kitchen, separate light-filled bedroom with a plush king bed dressed in crisp white linens, and a gorgeous ensuite with an indulgent bathtub that faces the sparkling pool. You'll want for nothing at One Eleven - feel like a VIP with a private butler catering to your every need 24 hours a day, or unwind in your extravagant private spa gazebo overlooking the pool, where One Eleven's expert masseuses can soothe and stretch your body without you ever having to leave your villa. Organise in-villa dining or head to the intimate Shiro restaurant, where exquisite fresh sushi is complemented by an impressive sake selection. When you want to explore, this super-sleek sanctuary's enviable location in the heart of Seminyak allows easy access to boutiques, bars and Bali's hottest beach clubs, including Potato Head and Mrs Sippy.

hotels.title: Blissful Bali Escape Moments from Seminyak Beach with Lagoon-Style Pool & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Find yourself in the charming Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six, nestled in the heart of Bali's vibrant Seminyak and a stone's throw from Double Six Beach, where sunsets are legendary. Delight in the resort's lagoon-style pool, soothing spa, and picturesque Beach Restaurant offering relaxed dining in paradise. Explore Seminyak's chic boutiques, trendy eateries and thriving nightlife, before retreating for a tasty cocktail at the Sunken Pool Bar and a night of restful slumber.

hotels.title: Tropical Private Villa Sanctuary with Private Pools Surrounded by Balinese Flora
hotels.description: Escape to the tropical sanctuary that is the Eight Palms Villa, a secluded escape in the heart of Bali's Legian region. Enjoy your intimate stay at this decadent retreat, surrounded by the traditional Balinese design and rich flora that defines the island as a sacred place of revitalising relaxation. Relax at the nearby stunning beaches and enjoy unforgettable, colourful sunsets. Enjoy everything that the vibrant island has to offer, before escaping to the tranquility of your intimate hideaway.

hotels.title: Romantic Seminyak Escape with Private Jacuzzi
hotels.description: Take the romance up a notch when you stay at Sini Vie Resort Seminyak by Ini Vie Hospitality, located in the heart of Seminyak, Bali's capital of cool. Take long, leisurely soaks in your private jacuzzi, or pop over to the adjoining Shichirin, renowned for serving up the best breakfast and lunch in Bali. When you're not reveling in the romance of your oasis, head out to explore Seminyak: Eat Street is an easy 15-minute drive away and hosts some of Bali's best restaurants and beach bars.

hotels.title: Bali's First-Ever Grand Mercure Seminyak with Three Outdoor Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the best of Seminyak, nestled only a short stroll from the iconic and vibrant sands of Double Six Beach. Enjoy long walks along the sand or wander around the lively district of Seminyak, famed for its eclectic mix of fashionable boutiques, award-winning bars and restaurants right on your doorstep. Experience Bali’s relaxed vibe by lounging in one of the hotel’s three outdoor pools, followed by a rejuvenating treatment at the in-house spa. Kids can enjoy the kids' club while adults sip craft cocktails at the Lagoon Pool Bar. From sunrise to evening, savor international and traditional Balinese dishes at Batur, featuring elegant interiors with views of the shimmering pool.

hotels.title: Five-Star Seminyak Beachfront Retreat with Onsite Spa, Three Bars & Restaurants
hotels.description: Make your next Bali break the best one yet with a stay at one of Seminyak's most prestigious beachfront resorts, The Oberoi Beach Resort Bali. Perched on the sands of Kaya Aya Beach in the middle of buzzy Seminyak, this five-star escape is perfectly placed for exploring the vibrant Seminyak Square or indulging in world-class dining at the renowned 'Eat Street'. End your day in the resort's opulent spa, catch a traditional dance performance in the natural amphitheatre, or dine under the stars at the Frangipani Cafe.

hotels.title: Romantic Seminyak Retreat at Morocco-Inspired Villas with Private Pool
hotels.description: Experience a romantic Bali escape like no other at the luxurious Cyrus Villa Seminyak by iNi Vie Hospitality. Venture out to Seminyak's best restaurants, bars and entertainment, or relax in the total tranquillity of your villa and take a dip in your sparkling private pool, surrounded by warm, Morocco-inspired design. To ensure an unforgettable stay, the villa's dedicated staff can arrange a number of surprises such as candlelit dinners and a lavish floating breakfast (charges may apply).

hotels.title: Secluded Seminyak Bohemian Escape with Tropical Gardens & Resort Pool
hotels.description: Experience Blue Karma Village, a hidden bohemian haven of tranquillity, home to 16 carefully curated, private joglos, suites and villas set amongst lush tropical gardens - just 15 minutes from Seminyak. At the heart of the hotel’s boutique offerings lies Hiiragi Restaurant - an oasis of culinary greatness combining traditional Japanese techniques with Peruvian flavours. After exploring all Seminyak has to offer, retreat home to explore the resort's palm-lined surrounds, including the three sparkling pools.

hotels.vendor_name: KLEO Seminyak (Formerly known Studio at Alila Seminyak)
hotels.title: Chic Seminyak Stay near Petitenget Beach with Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: A tranquil escape awaits at these modern studios nestled in vibrant Seminyak. Just moments from the buzz of Seminyak Square and Eat Street, this stylish retreat blends modern comfort with touches of traditional Balinese charm, offering a peaceful sanctuary after a day of island exploration. Unwind by the rooftop pool with a cocktail in hand as you take in sweeping views of the Indian Ocean, or indulge in Indonesian cuisine at the onsite restaurant. With iconic landmarks like Potato Head Beach Club and the sacred Petitenget Temple a stone's throw away, you'll find the perfect balance of cultural discovery and nightlife right at your doorstep.

hotels.title: Romantic Balinese Resort in Seminyak
hotels.description: Minutes from Bali’s bustling heart is a place that feels worlds away - Monolocale Resort, whose suites and villas exhibit a blend of art and opulence for an unforgettably serene escape. Sip cocktails under blue skies in the hotel pool, eat your way through Sanctuary’s tantalising Indonesian menu, take a short trip to Petitenget Beach to watch the waves roll in, or spend a day hopping between Bali's world-famous beach clubs and nightlife.

hotels.title: Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Private Butler & Wellness Spa
hotels.description: Nestled in Seminyak, your private pool villa offers the perfect blend of serenity and luxury. Enjoy spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, a shimmering pool and the top-tier service of a private butler. Whether dining in with meals crafted by a personal chef or indulging in a relaxing spa treatment at the +spa, your stay promises ultimate comfort and indulgence. Spend days wandering through Seminyak Square and Seminyak Village shopping districts, savour traditional street food flavours, opt for Italian eateries including Ultimo Restaurant or ride the waves at Seminyak Beach’s famed surf break.

hotels.title: Seminyak Luxury Pool Villas with Onsite Dining, Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Unwind in Peppers luxury amid the vibrant streets of Seminyak, one of the world's most beloved beachside playgrounds. Open your villa door and step onto bustling streets filled with high-end boutiques, serene yoga studios, charming coffee shops and acclaimed restaurants. The Peppers brand is renowned for providing plush accommodation, first-class facilities and personalised service, and this boutique property is no exception. Home to elegant pool villas, a day spa featuring a sauna and ice bath, plus a fine dining restaurant, this resort invites you to leave it all behind and relax in the privacy of your own pocket of paradise.

hotels.title: Boutique Bali Pool Villa Escape in the Heart of Seminyak
hotels.description: Nestled on the southwest coast of Bali, near the sandy shores of Petitenget Beach in the heart of vibrant Seminyak, you’ll find the elegant Elysian Boutique Villa Hotel. Designed as a sanctuary for travellers who want to rest, relax and experience Bali, The Elysian is a haven of contemporary private villas, all with private pools and stylish interiors. This unique Balinese village-inspired retreat is also full of beautiful social spaces and idyllically positions guests in the heart of the action. Surrounded by private gardens and within easy reach of Seminyak's stylish bars, restaurants and shops, this boutique gem is a one-of-a-kind destination where creativity, luxury and tranquillity blissfully merge. Follow the artful timber paths to reach the flower-filled garden, where an impressive pool with spacious cabanas awaits. Let serenity find you at the spa, where you can unwind with your choice of traditional Balinese treatments, or discover local treasures on two wheels with onsite bicycle hire, and afterwards the onsite Rush Bamboo Restaurant will take you on a culinary journey through local and international fare. When you’re ready to unwind in total privacy, The Elysian Boutique Villa Hotel's luxurious villas - brimming with character and traditional interiors - are waiting for you.

seo.title: Hotel a Seminyak - Indonesia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Seminyak, Indonesia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
